BLFX Lantern.name: BLFX Lantern
BLFX Lantern.description:
Once lit, the lantern casts light and burns for 6 hours on a single flask (1 pint) of oil.

GM Notes:

  • After equipping the lantern, you can customize its light settings using the Configure activity.

  • Only the GM can access the Configure activity. It can be safely deleted if you don't want players to see it.

  • To reset the light settings to default, simply delete the lantern and drag a new one from the Boss Loot FX Compendium.

  • If you accidentally delete the lantern while its light is active, just drag a new lantern on the token and use it again.

Torch.name: Torch
Torch.description:
A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If you make a melee attack with a burning torch and hit, it deals 1 fire damage.

See the tutorial on how to enable it for players: https://youtu.be/LIOdHPWVYf0
